key_risks: Regulatory and policy risks due to dependence on government subsidies and incentives
Supply chain disruptions affecting solar module production and logistics
Geopolitical tensions in key markets like the U.S. and Europe
Intense competition from larger players in the solar project development space
Historical financial performance issues due to transition from manufacturing to project development
controversies: Rebranding and strategic shift from ReneSola to Emeren Group Ltd
Historical financial struggles and inconsistent profitability
environmental_issues: Dependence on solar energy projects, which are subject to environmental regulations and potential impacts on local ecosystems
social_issues: Community development initiatives in regions where it operates, which may face local opposition or challenges
governance_issues: Implementation of advanced cybersecurity measures to protect operations and data

sources.title: ReneSola rebrands as Emeren - pv magazine USA
sources.snippet: The legal name "ReneSola Ltd." is now "Emeren Group Ltd," and the company's NYSE stock trading name will be changed to "Emeren Group Ltd." on or about February 9, 2023.
